Package net.medcommons

Class Summary
IdentityConnection This class maintains a JDBC connection to an identity database, linking SAML-provided users to their MCIDs and medcommons servers.
IdentityConnectionPool  
IdentityServlet Abstract Base Class for the identity webapp's servlets.
LoginServlet Handle logins from an external SAML-enabled customer, or from existing users completing our login/registration form.
LogoutServlet The Logout servlet clears all cookies, and presents the user with the main login page.
Pool A synchronized FIFO.
RegisterServlet This servlet is the action for the register form.
